findings.title: Contracts have withdrawal fee
findings.description: The contracts have a withdrawal fee which may impact user experience or profitability.

findings.title: Duplicate Internal Functionality
findings.description: The functions balanceFortubeInToken, balanceFulcrumInToken, balanceVenusInToken, and balanceAlpacaInToken duplicate internal functions' functionality.

findings.title: _rebalance function is internal and unused
findings.description: The _rebalance function is declared as internal but it's not being used anywhere in the contract.

findings.title: Insufficient Balance Calculation
findings.description: If the user's balance is lower than the deposit amount, profit value calculation and withdrawal functionality will fail.

findings.title: Deposited amount is rebalanced with current deposited amount to current balance rate
findings.description: The deposited amount is recalculated using the current deposited amount and the current balance rate, which may lead to incorrect calculations.

findings.title: Owner can change apr address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the APR address, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change fee amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change fee address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee address.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Fee Precision Modification
findings.description: The owner has the capability to modify the fee precision, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: EarnAPRWithPool Owner Privilege: Adding Token Addresses
findings.description: The owner of EarnAPRWithPool has the privilege to add fulcrum, fortube, venus, and alpaca token addresses.

findings.title: APRWithPoolOracle can change alpaca token index
findings.description: The APRWithPoolOracle has the privilege to modify the alpaca token index, which may lead to unintended consequences.
